runs.comm: Steyn starts off with a full delivery, 136 kmph, around the off stump, driven to mid-off
First four of the semi-final. Akmal throws the first punch. It was short in length and outside off, Akmal went back and across to cut it past point.
lovely delivery shaping away from the off stump, Akmal shuffles across and pushes inside the line.
homing in on the off stump, length delivery, Akmal tries to hit on the up and edges it to square leg
length delivery on the off stump line, punched to AB at backward point
Slap. Wham. It was well outside off stump and Akmal flayed that. The ball flew through cover point in a flash.
shout for lbw but it was missing the off stump. It was full in length, skidded on to hit the pad. The bat was pushed outside the line. It would have missed off.

What a stunner from Van der Merwe. South Africa roar as they get into a huddle. It was a short of length delivery, going away from Shahzaib who top-edges the pull over mid-on. Van der Merwe swung back, ran ahead and dived forward to take a sharp catch.
Akmal is on fire. Third boundary for him. It was short in length and moving away from him, he quickly got back and across to pull it hard past square leg.
Smith makes a mess at wide mid-off. Another lovely shot from Akmal. He leaned forward to drive superbly to left of mid-off where Smith gets across but doesn't bend down quickly enough.
short in length, outside off, run down to third man. Afridi on strike.
fires a high bouncer and Afridi ducks. Bowden signals wide.
Afridiiiiiiiii!  It was a length delivery on the off and middle line, he stood tall and whacked it on the up and high over mid-on for his first boundary.
full in length, on the off stump, pushed to mid-off

Wallop! What a stunning hit from Akmal. Great to watch. Awesome, says Kepler Wessels and he is bang on. It was full in length around the off stump, Akmal smoked it through the line high over long-off. What a shot.

Steyn gets his revenge, the very next ball, though. What a cracker of a start already. The game is running along at a frenetic pace. It was the short-pitched delivery and Akmal, running high on adrenalin, went for the pull but top-edged it to mid-on.

cut through him like knife on butter. It cut back in from short of length, Malik was on the hop, realised the ball wasn't all that high and it was cutting back into him, he tried to stab it at the last minute but the ball burst through the bat and pad gap
tapped to square leg for a single, it spins past Botha
fires a bouncer on the middle and Afridi goes down under. And gets up to nod appreciatively at the bowler
length delivery moving across from Malik who is squared up and edges it but it falls well short of Kallis at lone slip
length delivery outside off stump, Malik gets forward to defend to cover point
gets back to push it past the bowler for a single
full toss, just below-waist high, swatted away to mid-off region
just outside off stump but from short of length and that allows Malik to cut it down to third man
moves outside the leg stump, the bowler fired it full on the base of the middle stump and Afridi lunged out to squeeze it to point.
full in length , Malik charges down the track to drive to Smith at mid-off
fires a short pitched delivery, Afridi is not in a position to put it away and Boucher collects in front of his face
another bouncer, throat-high, Afridi tries to pull but can't put wood on leather.
Thwack! It was dug in short but it didn't climb that high, just below chest-high, and Afridi pulls it hard over midwicket
short in length, dragged away to deep midwicket region, deep square leg fielder rushes across

Crash! Kallis tries to get another short-pitched delivery going but again, it doesn't climb all that high, at least not as high as he wanted and Afridi whacked it over wide midwicket in style. What an eventful start this has been. Afridi blew a kiss to Kallis,  Kallis isn't thrilled!
almost a run out. Malik dives to get back to his crease. He wanted to rotate the strike to Afridi but it was pushed straight to midwicket. He got back in time.
charges down the track to hit on the up but doesn't get much power behind it and will pick up a single to right of mid-off
cutting in, turned to short fine-leg
dug in short, at the rib-cage, dabbed to the on side
the yorker outside off stump, Afridi tries to run it down to third man but doesn't connect
slightly slower, around the off stump, pushed out to the off side for a single
length delivery, around 142 kmph, on the off stump, defended to the off side
short in length and moving down the leg side, Afridi tries to swing it away but misses it
140 kmph length delivery cutting back in, Afridi tried to slash it away, missed and Boucher took it
back of length around the off stump, guided to backward point
threatens to move to the leg side before coming back to his original position, Kallis gets it to bounce shoulder high around the off stump, steered to third man
lifting delivery on the off stump line, Malik hops back to fend it away to point.
another short delivery, outside off stump, swatted away to right of long-on
yorker length , on the off stump line, squeezed to left of short third-man for a single
full again, not quite yorker length, quickish delivery, driven to long-on
slower, drifting in, turned to short fine-leg
rushes down the track and drives inside-out to wide long-off region for couple of runs
very full in length, Malik was looking for the sweep and gets a bottom edge to backward square leg. Van der Merwe thought he would get a lbw there and he oohs and aahs after seeing the inside edge
on the middle and leg, turned to short fine-leg for a single
moves outside leg stump, Botha bowls a slow yorker, Malik is made to wait and he waits to drive to deep cover
slow through the air again, driven to long-off
spins in from the off stump, dabbed away to the off side
flighted full, on driven to wide long-on region for couple of runs
again very full, Afridi tries to lift it over but ends up driving it to long-on
floated outside off stump, Malik goes for the big off drive and edges it just short of short third man. Catch it was the cry but it falls short
moves down the track and wants to lift it over long-on but ends up dragging it, mistiming it, to wide long-on boundary. He will take the mishit!
swept away for a single
flatter, full, drifting in, driven to cover
skips down the track to drive to long-off
on the leg and middle line, swept to deep backward square leg

loud shout for lbw as Malik misses the sweep and the ball rolls away to the off side. Have to see the replay to see what happened there, perhaps it was turning away and missing off stump. In fact the opposite. It skidded on and Hawk eye suggests it would have clipped the outer half of the leg stump.
goes for the big swing over the on side but doesn't time and it and ends up dragging it for a single
couple of steps down the track and he flicks it over midwicket for a single
Afridi backs away to the leg side, Botha tries to fire it in, ends up as a full toss and Afridi thrashes it to cover boundary
Even better shot. Botha had slowed up the pace on this, given it more air, Afridi, who had moved outside leg again, waited before lifting it over extra-cover
Crash. Bang. Wallop. Again, intelligent stuff from AFridi. No mindless slogging this. He moved outside leg, waited for the full delivery to arrive before lofting it to extra-cover boundary.

Whaddaaplayaaa! After three big inside-out lofted drives he unfurls a delicate late cut! he has shown great control today. It was skidding just outside off stump - Botha had moved to round the stumps - Afridi hung on the back-foot, opened the bat-face and ran it down to third man boundary
slower one outside off stump, Malik stretches forward to drive to deep cover. Afridi back on strike.
really full delivery outside off stump, driven to long-on
walks down the track and towards the off side, Albie hurls it further outside off, run down to wide third man region
shuffles to the off side, Albie fires it full outside off, sliced away to sweeper cover
big swing and a miss but he couldn't reach it as it was well outside off stump.
fullish, outside off stump, Afridi whips it from there to wide long-on! What a knock so far. 50 up. Breezy, entertaining and very sensible.
driven to long-off for a single

Afridi's flamboyant innings comes to an end. Duminy flighted it up, slow through the air, and Afridi was too early into his slog sweep. The edge took the ball to midwicket. The crowd give him an standing ovation.
stretches forward to drive to long-off
flighted full outside off stump, gets well forward to drive to long-off
spins towards middle and leg, tickled to left of short fine-leg
floated outside off stump, swept away for a single
skips down the track, Duminy drags back the length and gets it to turn, and it hits the pad. A very fine over from Duminy.
lunges forward to turn it past midwicket

appeal for stumping. Malik stretched forward to drive but the ball spins past him and Boucher breaks the stumps. Malik's back foot was dragged slightly outside the crease but he dragged it back in time. Verdict from third umpire is Not Out. Agonizing wait for the crowd. The third umpire took his time and they waited in suspense before a relieved cheer.
low full toss and Malik connects well with his sweep shot and collects a boundary.
runs down the track, slows up the pace, driven to long-off
floated outside off stump, steered towards short third man where Albie slips and the ball rushes past him. The bowler is not happy and yells C'mon!
another sweep, another single and Pakistan reach 109
flighted outside off stump, Malik went down on his knee to dispose it over the leaping extra-cover fielder. Very fine shot.
moves down the track and swings to left of midwicket where AB makes a fine stop.
skips down the track, Duminy slows up the pace, driven to long-off
Ah! the reverse sweep now. Younis stretched forward to reverse it hard well clear of short third man. The crowd roar. Huge support for Pakistan
Now the conventional sweep, will pick up a single
Malik now tries the reverse sweep but not with the same effect. The ball bounds off the body to the on side for a leg bye
drifting in towards middle, Malik pings long-off for a single
turns towards off stump, wristed to square leg for a single
stretches well forward to fetch it from outside off and sweep to deep square leg region
Malik falls after a fine hand. He was down the track, didn't quite reach the pitch, went through with his lofted shot and holed out at long-off
worked past square leg for a single
quicker, flatter, skidding in, clipped through backward square leg
short in length, moving outside off stump, guided well to the right of Parnell at third man and they run hard to come back for the second run
the lifting bouncer and Razzak hops and sways away
short in length, around the off stump line, cut away to deep backward point region for another couple of runs.
nice little slower one and Razzaq was through with his cut shot very early and the ball bounces away to Boucher
full and hint of swing away, driven to sweeper cover
just short of the blockhole, on the middle, driven to long-on for a single. Good tight over from Steyn.
full delivery on the middle, nudged to the on side
full again, almost yorker length, squeezed to point. Two good balls so far.
goes for another yorker, ends up a very low dipping full toss, driven to long-off
fires it short this time, mistimes the pull for a single
very full again, just outside off stump, square driven to point where AB doesn't field cleanly and gives away a single
full delivery, driven to long-off for a single. SA are bowling very well here in the end overs.
moves towards leg side, Steyn fires it in full and on the base of middle stump, driven to AB at long-off
lands it on a length this time and that allows Younis to get under the ball and slice it high over point
the low full toss on the middle, driven to AB at long-off again. Just five runs so far.
just short of yorker length outside off, Razzaq chips it, slices it to left of sweeper cover
fullish, in the zone outside off stump, Razzaq has a big swing but can't connect. Bouch collects. Just one over left.
comes down the track but is greeted with a yorker, squeezes it out to cover. Superb bowling this.
And slips in the bouncer this time, Razzaq tries to pull but the bat meets air and the ball goes through to Boucher
And there comes the yorker, dug out to left of backward point where Ab makes a very fine diving stop
low full toss outside off stump, mis hit towards long-off.
another terrific yorker from the young Parnell, Razzaq gets in a tangle, tries to get the front leg out of the way and the ball rolls to the off side.
another very fine full delivery, in and around that blockhole, can only push it to Smith at cover.
